title: What are some interesting, lengthy YouTube videos to watch? - Quora

response.answer_text: For those interested in home maintenance, either as a job or for their own home, might find this video a must see. It is a full course (or lesson) with step by step detailed instructions for disassembling, cleaning, fixing and re-installing drain traps, including instructions and tricks to avoid damage to the plastic parts and clogging up your drains. Possibly the most comprehensive video on the topic. Course: How to clean, fix, install, household drain traps
